languages.text: "Пытать людей забавы ради — любимое занятие друкари. Едва ли они подозревали, что ты агент Инквизиции".

traits.locale_text: "Пытать людей забавы ради — любимое занятие друкари. Едва ли они подозревали, что ты агент Инквизиции".

languages.text: "It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."
languages.original_text: "Пытать людей забавы ради — любимое занятие друкари. Едва ли они подозревали, что ты агент Инквизиции".

traits.locale_text: "It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."
"It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."

"It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."
"It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."

languages.text: 「デュカーリは娯楽のために人を拷問するのが極上の遊びだと思っています。お員三が異端審問庁の審問官だとは思わなかったのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリは娯楽のために人を拷問するのが極上の遊びだと思っています。お員三が異端審問庁の審問官だとは思わなかったのでしょう」

languages.text: “黑暗灵族最喜欢的事情，便是以折磨人类为乐。我怀疑他们根本不知道你是审判庭的人。”
languages.original_text: "It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: “黑暗灵族最喜欢的事情，便是以折磨人类为乐。我怀疑他们根本不知道你是审判庭的人。”

languages.text: «Torturar a la gente por diversión es el pasatiempo favorito de los Drukhari. Dudo que supieran que pertenece a la Inquisición».
languages.original_text: "It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: «Torturar a la gente por diversión es el pasatiempo favorito de los Drukhari. Dudo que supieran que pertenece a la Inquisición».

languages.text: « La torture est l'un des loisirs favoris des Drukharis. Ils ignoraient certainement que vous étiez un agent de l'Inquisition. »
languages.original_text: "It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: « La torture est l'un des loisirs favoris des Drukharis. Ils ignoraient certainement que vous étiez un agent de l'Inquisition. »

languages.text: "Die Lieblingsbeschäftigung der Drukhari ist es, andere zum Spaß zu foltern. Ich bezweifle, dass sie ahnten, dass Ihr ein Agent der Inquisition seid."
languages.original_text: "It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "Die Lieblingsbeschäftigung der Drukhari ist es, andere zum Spaß zu foltern. Ich bezweifle, dass sie ahnten, dass Ihr ein Agent der Inquisition seid."

languages.text: "İşkence, Drukharilerin en sevdiği eğlencedir. Senin Engizisyon casusu olduğuna dair herhangi bir fikirleri olduğunu hiç sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "It is the Drukhari's favourite pastime to torture people for amusement. I doubt they had any inkling you were an agent of the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "İşkence, Drukharilerin en sevdiği eğlencedir. Senin Engizisyon casusu olduğuna dair herhangi bir fikirleri olduğunu hiç sanmıyorum."
